      • contentToString

        public static String contentToString(MailPart mailPart)
        Retrieve the part content as a string. Part must have text content.
        Parameters:
        mailPart - the part.
        Returns:
        the text.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the part is not text.
